CustomField.description: Captures the specific product model number, Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), or software version identifier if provided by the customer or identified by support. Aids in precise troubleshooting and knowledge retrieval.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the specific product model number, SKU, or software version if known (e.g., AeroMax 5000, SPS-Scanner-X1, BT-Controller-V2.1)
CustomField.label: WD Specific Product/SKU
